vinda anuvindau āvantyau kuntibhojam yaśasvinam
kauravaḥ vīrabāhuḥ ca virāṭa sutam uttaram

original: anye ca vīrā rājāno rājasiṃhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: anye ca vīrāḥ rājānaḥ rāja siṃhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
utsāha sattva saṃpannāḥ sa sainyāḥ yam upādravan
teṣām kaṅkaṇa ratna aṃśu paṭalāḥ kara nirgatāḥ
hema puṅkhā śarāḥ cakruḥ vahni vyāptam digantaram
athopuṅkhāḥ rajasā gaja vāji ratha ākulam
vīrāṇām tumulam yuddham nirmaryādam avartata
tatas śirobhiḥ vīrāṇām patita utphullitaiḥ muhur
amanda kanduka krīḍā babhūva iva raṇa śriyaḥ
tatas pāṇḍava sainyeṣu bhīṣma cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
vidārita iṣa bahuśas samuttasthau mahā ravaḥ
athā abhimanyuḥ abhyetya śatamanyu suta ātmajaḥ
bhīṣmam abhyādravat vīraḥ miṣatām sarva bhūbhujām
kṛtavarma prabhṛtibhiḥ sahitam bhīṣmam ojasā
ayodhayat sa viśi śvaiḥ dhvajam asya cakarta ca
hema tāle nipatite saṃrabdhaḥ tha pitāmahaḥ
divya asra varṣī sa āvegam saubhadram samupādravat
tatas vṛkodara mukhāḥ vinadantaḥ mahā rathāḥ
sa anugam śantanu sutam samantāt paryavārayan
bhīṣmaḥ pi sātyakim viddhvā dhvajam pavanajanmanaḥ

original: unmamātha śarāgreṇa haimaṃ kesariṇaṃ rathāt // Bhmj_6.205 //
analyzed: unmamātha śara agreṇa haimam kesariṇam rathāt
atrā antare giri prāṃśum āruhya mada kuñjaram
ayodhyat madra rājam hṛṣṭaḥ vairāṭiḥ uttaraḥ

original: sa kuñjarendraḥ śalyasya pādena caturo hayān /
analyzed: sa kuñjara indraḥ śalyasya pādena caturaḥ hayān
jaghāna ākṛṣya hastena garjan jalada niḥsvanaḥ

original: tato madrādhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śaktiṃ śaktimatāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: tatas madra adhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śaktim śaktimatām varaḥ
pradīptām prāhiṇot vegāt uttarāya iṣu varṣiṇe
sa tayā bhinna hṛdayaḥ papāta galita āyudhaḥ
karṇikāre iva bhraṣṭaḥ karīndra acala śekharāt
uttaram nihatam dṛṣṭvā śaṅkhaḥ tasya anujaḥ krudhā
cakāra śalyam abhyetya śaraiḥ jaṭila vigraham

original: tasya śalyo 'tha gadayā vidārya dalaśo ratham /
analyzed: tasya śalyaḥ tha gadayā vidārya dalaśas ratham
unnanāda abhavan yena diśaḥ śakalitāḥ iva

original: śaṅkho hatāśvaḥ sahasā phalguṇasya rathaṃ yayau /
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ hata aśvaḥ sahasā phalguṇasya ratham yayau
pāṇḍava camūm vyagāhata nṛpa antakaḥ
matsya kekayā pāñcāla cedi senāsu sarvaśas
bhīṣma bāṇa vibhinnāsu sūryaḥ sta śikharam yayau
tatas nivṛtte saṃgrāme śibirāṇi nareśvarāḥ
bhejire pratisaṃsantaḥ vipulam bhīṣma vikramam
prathame yuddha divase uttara vadhaḥ
dina ante dīrṇa pṛtanaḥ śoka ārtaḥ dharmanandanaḥ
saṃhāram nija sainyānām pradadhyau bhīṣma vikramam
sa rāja madhye govindam uvāca karuṇā ākulaḥ

original: kṣīyamāṇasya samare satyaṃ śreyastapo mama // Bhmj_6.216 //
analyzed: kṣīyamāṇasya samare satyam śreyaḥ tapaḥ mama
alam yuddhena me kṛṣṇa pṛthivī kṣaya kāriṇā

original: ko mucyeta raṇe prāpya bhīṣmaṃ bhīṣmaparākramam // Bhmj_6.217 //
analyzed: kaḥ mucyeta raṇe prāpya bhīṣmam bhīṣma parākramam
iti bruvāṇam rājānam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: dhruvaste vijayo rājanyasya yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_6.218 //
analyzed: dhruvaḥ te vijayaḥ rājan yasya yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ
sātyakiḥ drupadaḥ śaibyaḥ sikhaṇḍī pañca kekayāḥ

original: saubhadraśca raṇe kruddho hanyādeva gaṇānapi // Bhmj_6.219 //
analyzed: saubhadraḥ ca raṇe kruddhaḥ hanyāt eva gaṇān api
ukte janārdanena iti tīvram bhīṣma parākramam

original: mithaḥ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ sā jagāma vibhāvarī // Bhmj_6.220 //
analyzed: mithas kathayatām teṣām sā jagāma vibhāvarī
atha udite sahasrāṃśau vihite pāṇḍu nandanaiḥ
kruñcavyūhe mahā utsāhaiḥ vyūham anye cakrire
tatas pravṛtte samare tīvre bhīru bhayaṃkare
hṛdaya akampane na ājñām tālaketuḥ adṛśyata
gambhīra dhīra saṃrambhaḥ varjayan sa pṛthagjanam
cakarta bhūbhujām eva śirāṃsi laghu vikramaḥ
bhīṣmeṇa ālolite vyūhe vāta uddhūte iva ārmave
tam abhyadhāvat saṃrabdhaḥ śvetāśvaḥ cyuta sārathiḥ
tam āpatantam viśakhaiḥ bhīṣmaḥ kṣipram apūrayat
droṇa duryodhana mukhāḥ sarve ca anye mahā rathāḥ
pārthaḥ pi sāyakaiḥ cakre samantāt kuru vāhinīm
tad pakṣa pavana sphāraiḥ dīrṇām iva sahasradhā
duryodhana preritaḥ tha svayam śantanunandanaḥ
nindat nijam kṣatra dharmam abhyadāvat dhanaṃjayam
nirviśeṣam tayoḥ tatra su ciram yudhyamānayoḥ

original: niruddhāṃ śarajālena nādṛśyanta diśo daśa // Bhmj_6.228 //
analyzed: niruddhām śara jālena na adṛśyanta diśaḥ daśa

original: na dadarśa tayoḥ kaścidantaraṃ kṣipatoḥ śarān /
analyzed: na dadarśa tayoḥ kaścid antaram kṣipatoḥ śarān
dhārā sāra prabalayoḥ nadatoḥ iva meghayoḥ
tatas droṇa mukhāḥ vīrāḥ dhṛṣṭadyumna purogamaiḥ
ayudhyanta abhavan yena surāḥ pulakitāḥ divi
bhībhasenaḥ kaliṅgānām praviśya atha varuthinīm
pātayan kuñjarān cakre niḥsaṃcārām vasuṃdharām
bhīma nirbhinna matta ibha kumbha udbhūta asṛj ambhasām
pravāhaiḥ yayuḥ ākaṇṭham turaṅgāḥ kṛccha gāminaḥ
nihatya kuñjara anīkam kaliṅgānām prahāriṇām
ketumantam narapatim jaghāna sa padānugam
niḥśeṣita kaliṅgasya bhīmasenasya nādataḥ
ghana gambhīra nādena pṛthivī samakampata
tatas bhīṣmaḥ samabhyetya dṛṣṭvā dīrṇām anīkinīm
vidhāya viratham bhīmam śaineya aśvān apothayat
duryodhana sutam vīram lakṣmaṇam śaurya lakṣaṇam
abhimanyuḥ śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ kṣipra hastam apothayat
gocare patitam putram saubhadrasya pramāthinaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājā sānugaḥ svayamādravat // Bhmj_6.237 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ rājā sa anugaḥ svayam ādravat
kuru vīraiḥ parivṛtam vilokya sutam arjunaḥ
maṇḍalīkṛta gāṇḍīvaḥ tūrṇam pratyudyayau parān
lāghavāt abhitas tasya sāyakāḥ citra yodhinaḥ

original: jahnuḥ śirāṃsi śūrāṇāṃ phalānīva mahīruhām // Bhmj_6.239 //
analyzed: jahnuḥ śirāṃsi śūrāṇām phalāni iva mahīruhām
ākhaṇḍala bhuvā caṇḍa gāṇḍīva preritaiḥ śaraiḥ
vidāriteṣu anīkeṣu vidhvasta ratha sādiṣu
rudhireṇa iva gagane pūrite

original: avahāraṃ raṇe cakre vāsarānte pitāmahaḥ // Bhmj_6.241 //
analyzed: avahāram raṇe cakre vāsara ante pitāmahaḥ
ditīyaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
anyedyus gāruḍam vyūham dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmeṇa kalpitam
ardhacandram prativyūham cakrire pāṇḍu nandanāḥ
tatas pravṛte samare bhīrūṇām dhṛti khaṇḍane
ārūḍhā iva mahī vyoma rajasā samalakṣyata
asṛj pravāhaiḥ sahasā praśānte reṇu maṇḍale
su ghoraḥ saṃprahāraḥ bhūt nṛpāṇām tridaśa īkṣitaḥ
bhīṣma droṇa mukhaiḥ vīraiḥ
phalguṇa pramukhāḥ raṇe
saṃsaktāḥ samadṛśyanta pūrvadevaiḥ iva amarāḥ
bāṇa jālena mahatā saṃhatānām samantataḥ
arjunena niruddhāsu ripūṇām śastra vṛṣṭiṣu
akampitau kuru vyūhe bhīmasena ghaṭotkacau
praviśya cakratuḥ vīrau vyākulām para vāhinīm
tau abhyadhāvat saṃrambhāt amarṣī dhṛtarāṣṭra jaḥ
kurvan āja samājena diśaḥ
haiḍamba bāṇa nihatāḥ vīrāḥ tasya padānugāḥ
mahā vāta samākrāntāḥ drumāḥ iva cakampire
duryodhana preritānām śarāṇām dīpta tejasām
vṛṣṭim abhyudgatām ghorām ciccheda āśu vṛkodaraḥ
bhīma utsṛṣṭena pṛthunā pṛṣaṅketke
nātha kauravaḥ

original: hṛdi viddho nimagnena mumoha bhṛśavihvalaḥ // Bhmj_6.251 //
analyzed: hṛdi viddhaḥ nimagnena mumoha bhṛśa vihvalaḥ
tasmin sārathinā nīte rathena ākula ketunā
dudrāva sainyam tat sarvam paśyatoḥ dreṇa bhīṣmayoḥ
mahā rathaiḥ vārite kīrṇe tasmin bala arṇave

original: pratyudyayau samāśvasya tūrṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_6.253 //
analyzed: pratyudyayau samāśvasya tūrṇam rājā suyodhanaḥ
pārtha sātyaki saubhadraiḥ sa dṛṣṭvā bahuśas camūm
vidrāvitām samabhyetya pitāmaham abhāṣata
dāritam paśya me sainyam labdhalakṣaiḥ arātibhiḥ
pāṇḍu putreṣu kṛpayā tvayi mādhyasthyam āśrite
alam droma sahāyasya paristhātum puras tava

original: madabhāgyavaśānna syādyadi pārtheṣu vaḥ kṛpā // Bhmj_6.256 //
analyzed: mad abhāgya vaśāt na syāt yadi pārtheṣu vaḥ kṛpā
etat suyodhanena uktam śrutvā surasarit sutaḥ
īṣat smita sudhā dhauta kapola phalakaḥ vadat
uktaḥ u si bahuśas rājan ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ iti

original: yattu śakyaṃ mayā kiṃcidvṛddhenādya karomi kim // Bhmj_6.258 //
analyzed: yat tu śakyam mayā kiṃcid vṛddhena adya karomi kim
iti uktvā cāpam ākṛṣya tāla mātram mahā bhujaḥ
mandāyamāne divase samam abhyudyayau parān
tatas bhīṣma ratha udīrṇaiḥ śaraiḥ sūrya kara prabhaiḥ
vidāritāni anekāni tamāṃsi iva kṣayam yayuḥ
tomareṣu ātapatreṣu śarīreṣu ca bhūbhujām
petuḥ punar abhāvāya bhīṣma nāma aṅkitāḥ śarāḥ
adṛṣṭa puṅkha vadanaiḥ ghana śreṇīkṛtaiḥ muhur
tad sāyakaiḥ adṛśyā abhūt pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
tam yudhyamānam dīpta astram varjayantaḥ pi saṃgare
dikṣu bhīṣma sahasrāṇi dadṛśuḥ sarva pārthivāḥ
vrajatsu rāja cakreṣu bhīṣma anala pataṅga tām

original: ekenaikena bāṇena bhinneṣu triṣu dantiṣu // Bhmj_6.264 //
analyzed: ekena ekena bāṇena bhinneṣu triṣu dantiṣu
yāte sahasradhā sainye pāṇḍavānām tarasvinām
anayat phalguṇa ratham gāṅgeya antikam acyutaḥ
tatas bhavat bhīṣma śaraiḥ bhāsvaraiḥ savyasācinaḥ
kṣaṇam pañcānanasya iva cāru kāñcana pañjaraḥ
niruddha śara saṃcāraḥ yatnena śatamanyu jaḥ
vicitraiḥ vicaran mārgaiḥ yuyudhe kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
tasya ati mānuṣam dhairyam āsthitasya pitāmahaḥ
sādhu putra iti saṃhṛṣṭaḥ parākramam apūjayat
tad kaṅka pattri nirbhinnau kṛṣṇau eka rathe sthitau
rakta aśokau iva utphullau babhatuḥ kṣataja ukṣitau
tatas nirantaraiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhīṣma kārmuka nirgataiḥ
ākrānta bhuvana ābhogaiḥ nā adṛśyanta diśaḥ daśa
bhīṣme pṛthu śara jvāle kāla anale iva udyate
dudrāva pāṇḍava camūḥ paścāt abhisṛtā paraiḥ
bhagneṣu bhaṭa mukhyeṣu babhāṣe kaiṭabhāntakaḥ
kva nu māna dhanāḥ yūyam apāra yaśasaḥ raṇe
parityajya kula ācāram yātāḥ kātara tām imām
iti uktvā tān samālokya vidrutān eva keśavaḥ

original: uvāca sātyakiṃ vīraṃ yudhyamānaṃ prayatnataḥ // Bhmj_6.273 //
analyzed: uvāca sātyakim vīram yudhyamānam prayatnataḥ

original: tiṣṭhantu yāntu vā sarve sātyake pṛtanāgragāḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhantu yāntu vā sarve sātyake pṛtanā agragāḥ

original: eṣa svayaṃ nihanmyadya sānugaṃ śantanoḥ sutam // Bhmj_6.274 //
analyzed: eṣa svayam nihanmi adya sa anugam śantanoḥ sutam
iti uktvā caṇḍa mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala agram sudarśanam
svayam udyamya kaṃsāriḥ syandana agrāt avātarat
kruddhasya tasya kalpa anta karāla anala rociṣaḥ

original: na rūpaṃ sehire draṣṭuṃ surā api divi sthitāḥ // Bhmj_6.276 //
analyzed: na rūpam sehire draṣṭum surāḥ api divi sthitāḥ
saṃrambha udbhrānta dos daṇḍa vilasat pīta vāsasā

original: śobhāṃ bheje sa nīlādreḥ sarpatsaṃdhyābhraśālinaḥ // Bhmj_6.277 //
analyzed: śobhām bheje sa nīla adreḥ sarpat saṃdhyā abhra śālinaḥ
tam antakam iva āyāntam jagat saṃhāra dīkṣitam

original: dhīraḥ śāntanavo dṛṣṭvā dhunāno dhanurabhyadhāt // Bhmj_6.278 //
analyzed: dhīraḥ śāṃtanavaḥ dṛṣṭvā dhunānaḥ dhanuḥ abhyadhāt
ehi ehi bhagavan viṣṇo jiṣṇo tridaśa vidviṣām
cakreṇa me śiraḥ chindhi bhava kleśa kṛśānunā
bhavatā nābhi jāmbhoja samuddhūta svayaṃbhuvā

original: hato jagannivāsena dhanyatāṃ yātvayaṃ janaḥ // Bhmj_6.280 //
analyzed: hataḥ jagannivāsena dhanya tām yātu ayam janaḥ
siddha sindhu sutena iti bhāṣite nata maulinā
avaruhya radhāt tūrṇam arjunaḥ kṛṣṇam anvagāt
sa niṣpīḍya balāt pādau purastāt kāliya dviṣaḥ

original: uvāca saṃhara vibho kopaṃ viśvakṣayocitam // Bhmj_6.282 //
analyzed: uvāca saṃhara vibho kopam viśva kṣaya ucitam
kṣapayāmi ripūn sarvān yudhi satyena te śape

original: iti prasādya taṃ pārtho rathamāropayatpunaḥ // Bhmj_6.283 //
analyzed: iti prasādya tam pārthaḥ ratham āropayat punar
tatas gāṇḍīva ghoṣeṇa pāñcajanya raveṇa ca
cakrāte rāja cakrāṇām kṛṣṇau kṛṣṇa ambuda bhramam
tatas nirvivaraiḥ bāṇaiḥ śalya bhiri śravaḥ śalāḥ
avākiran bhīṣma mukhāḥ phalguṇam śastra vṛṣṭibhiḥ
tām āyudha mahā vṛṣṭim chittvā sapadi pāṇjavaḥ
māhendram astram vidadhe sarva loka kṣaya kṣamam
tasmin udīrṇe sahasā mahā astre dīpta tejasi
caṇḍa vāta vikīrṇā iva cakampe kuru vāhinī
vadhyamāneṣu saineṣu kṣipram gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
nara nāga aśva deha utthā sasarpa rudhira āpagā
chattra accha phena paṭalām calat cāmara sārasām
keśa śevāla śabalām piśācāḥ tām siṣevire
ghore nṛpa kṣaye tasmin vartamāne raṇa utsave

original: saṃdhyayā dikṣu jātāsu śoṇitena bhṛtāsviva // Bhmj_6.290 //
analyzed: saṃdhyayā dikṣu jātāsu śoṇitena bhṛtāsu iva
yāte stam caṇḍakiraṇe pratyagra rudhira tviṣi

original: māṃsapiṇḍa iva graste ghoreṇa dhvāntarakṣasā // Bhmj_6.291 //
analyzed: māṃsa piṇḍe iva graste ghoreṇa dhvānta rakṣasā
vidhvasta cāpa kavacāḥ viprakīrṇa ratha dhvajāḥ
avahāram akurvanta pāṇḍavāḥ śastra vikṣatāḥ
tṛtīyaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
punar prabhāte saṃrabdhāḥ niryayuḥ kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
vinadantaḥ mahā utsāhāḥ vyāḍa vyūha agra vartinaḥ
atha pravṛtte samare pṛthivī kṣaya śaṃsini
saubhadra pramukhāḥ vīrān bhīṣma mukhyān ayodhayan
tatas śara śata āsāra saṃpūrita digantaraḥ
mahā rathān atītya anyān bhīṣmaḥ ūrjunam upādravat
nirviśeṣam tayoḥ kṣipram pīrayoḥ yudhyamānayoḥ
ekaḥ droṇi mukhān vīrān abhimanyuḥ ayodhayat
chinna varma dhvaja rathān sa vidhāya mahā rathān
śiraḥ prakaram ucchinnam rājñām kṣipram apātayat
droṇa prabhṛtibhiḥ sarvaiḥ dṛṣṭvā saubhadram āvṛtam
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ camū nāthaḥ cakarta abhyetya kauravān

original: sa hatvā cāmaraṃ śūraḥ pauravyatanayaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: sa hatvā ca amaram śūraḥ pauravya tanayam nṛpam
śiraḥsaṃyamaneḥ kāyāt jahāra ākula kuṇḍalam
atrā antare gaja anīkaiḥ vipulaiḥ ca gaja adhipaḥ
bhīma duryodhana ādiṣṭaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ samādravat
bhīmasenaḥ tha rabhasāt avaruhya rathāt gajān
garjan uru gadā ghātaiḥ jaghāna ghana vikramaḥ
gadā prahāra abhihataiḥ vajra bhinnaiḥ iva acalaiḥ
patadbhiḥ matta mātaṅgaiḥ cakampe cakitā iva bhūḥ
nihate kuñjara anīke bhīmena bhaya dāyinā
tam abhyadhāvan saṃkruddhāḥ sarve duryodhana ādayaḥ
suyodhana śara āghāta mūrchitaḥ vṛkodaraḥ
samāśvāsya para anīkam rathena kupitaḥ viśat
viśva saṃhāra saṃkruddham tam kṛtāntam iva utthitam
prāpya anujāḥ kuru pateḥ caturdaśa yayuḥ kṣayam
senāpatim suṣeṇam ca jaya saṃdham su locanam
bhīmam ugram bhīma ratham bhīma bāhum alolupam
samam vavitsum kaṭakam durmukham duṣpradarśanam
hatvā enām akarot senām kauravāṇām sahasradhā
tam abhyadhāvat mattena supratīkena dantinā
gambhīra ghora ghoṣeṇa bhagadattaḥ saha anugaiḥ
gaja udaya acala raveḥ śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ iva aṃśubhiḥ
pratāpa dhāmnaḥ tasya ārāt sa ca kopa ari vāhinī
tad sāyakena hṛdi marma avabhedinā
dhvaja yaṣṭim samālambya tasthau

bhagadattam abhidrutya ghorām māyām samādade
airāvaṇa gataḥ saḥ tha prabhinnaiḥ digdvipaiḥ saha
apīḍayat supratīkam dīptābhiḥ śastra vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: śabdena tasthurālīya sarve saṃkucitā gajāḥ // Bhmj_6.313 //
analyzed: śabdena tasthuḥ ālīya sarve saṃkucitāḥ gajāḥ
ghaṭotkacena saṃsaktam dṛṣṭvā prāgjyotiṣa īśvaram
saha droṇa ādibhiḥ vīraiḥ bhīṣmaḥ tam deśam ādravat
ghaṭotkacam kāla rūpam nadantam vīkṣya bhairavam

original: saṃdhyāyāṃ durjayaṃ matvā bhīṣmastaṃ bhīmavikramam // Bhmj_6.315 //
analyzed: saṃdhyāyām durjayam matvā bhīṣmaḥ tam bhīma vikramam
avahāram su sainyānām vidadhe dhīmatām varaḥ
yena abhavan kāla vaktrāt niṣkrāntāḥ iva kauravāḥ
caturthaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
tatas niśāyām abhyetya kururājaḥ pitāmaham
papraccha pāṇḍu putrāṇām duḥkhitaḥ jaya kāraṇam
tam abravīt śāntanavaḥ rājan uktaḥ si sarvadā

original: devena viṣṇunā guptā na jeyāḥ pāṇḍavā iti // Bhmj_6.318 //
analyzed: devena viṣṇunā guptāḥ na jeyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ iti
purā bhū bhāra śānti artham svayaṃbhūḥ muni saṃsadi

original: prādurbhūtaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇuṃ tuṣṭāva sahasāṃ nidhim // Bhmj_6.319 //
analyzed: prādurbhūtam svayam viṣṇum tuṣṭāva sahasām nidhim
jaya viśveśa viśvātman viśvaksena sudhānidhe

namaḥ pracaṇḍa cakra agra prabhā bāsura bāhave
daitya andhakāra saṃhāra kāriṇe moha dāriṇe

original: avatīrṇā bhuvaṃ nātha dānavā ye hatāstvayā /
analyzed: avatīrṇā bhuvam nātha dānavāḥ ye hatāḥ tvayā

original: teṣāṃ vadhāya dṛptānāṃ mānuṣī tanumāviśa // Bhmj_6.323 //
analyzed: teṣām vadhāya dṛptānām mānuṣī tanum āviśa

original: iti stutāḥ padmabhuvā devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: iti stutāḥ padma bhuvā devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
nareṇa sākam bhū bhāra śāntyai kṣitim avātarat
saḥ eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān jātaḥ yādava nandanaḥ

original: naraśca vijayo dhīraḥ pravaraḥ sarvadhanvinām // Bhmj_6.325 //
analyzed: naraḥ ca vijayaḥ dhīraḥ pravaraḥ sarva dhanvinām
devau kṛṣṇa arjunau etau na jeyau tridaśaiḥ api

original: iti jñātvā śamaḥ putra kriyatāṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ // Bhmj_6.326 //
analyzed: iti jñātvā śamaḥ putra kriyatām pāṇḍu nandanaiḥ
viśvepākhyānam
atha prabhāte makaraśyena vyūha agra vartinaḥ
bhīṣma bhīma mukhāḥ yuddham cakrire pāṇḍu nandanāḥ

original: hatānāṃ hanyamānānāṃ ghnatāṃ ca samare mithaḥ /
analyzed: hatānām hanyamānānām ghnatām ca samare mithas
patatām tatra vīrāṇām niḥsvaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
bhīma phalguṇa saubhadra matsya sātyaki pārṣataiḥ

original: bhīṣmamukhyaiśca te sene bhinne saṃśayamāpatuḥ // Bhmj_6.329 //
analyzed: bhīṣma mukhyaiḥ ca te sene bhinne saṃśayam āpatuḥ
kabandha tāṇḍavaḥ caṇḍe matta vetāla saṃkule
tasmin āyodhane ghore bhūtānām utsavaḥ bhavat
dhanvinām śara jālena divam utpatatām muhur
ravau saṃchādite rājñām vyarthaḥ bhūt śastra saṃgrahaḥ
bīreṇa bhūriśravasā saṃsaktam vīkṣya sātyakim
abhyādraban dhanvinaḥ tam deśam sātyaki sūnavaḥ
teṣām āpatatām pūrṇam sṛjatām śara durdinam
bhūriśravāḥ śirāṃsi ārāduścakarta śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
hateṣu teṣu kupitaḥ pradīpta astraḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
cakāra kuru senānām saṃhāram hari sārathiḥ
hate lakṣa caturbhāge bhūbhujām anivartinām
gāmḍīvadhanvanā sainyam vāsara ante nyavartata
pañcamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
punar prabhāte saṃnaddhāḥ niryayuḥ kuru pāṇḍavāḥ
alakṣya bheda avyūhābhyām krauñcena makareṇa ca
tatas pramathya sahasā bhīmasenaḥ rivā ahinīm
viveśa bhṛśa saṃkruddhaḥ samam drupada sūnunā
tābhyām vidārite vyūhe kupitāḥ kuru nandanāḥ
vimukhaiḥ kuñjara anīkaiḥ tau tūrṇam paryavārayan
bhīmasena gadā ghāta niṣpiṣṭa vapuṣām raṇe
abhūt vyatikaraḥ ghoraḥ patatām gaja yodhinām
yudhyamāneṣu sainyeṣu bhīmena bhuja śālinā
abhyādravat sa anugaḥ tam svayam rājā suyodhanaḥ
chāditam kauravaiḥ dṛṣṭvā bhīmam viśikha varṣibhiḥ

original: vimohaṃ vidadhe teṣāṃ mohanāstreṇa pārṣanaḥ // Bhmj_6.341 //
analyzed: vimoham vidadhe teṣām mohana astreṇa pārṣanaḥ
droṇena svayam abhyetya jñāna astreṇa vināśite

mada andha kva adhunā jīvan mayi jīvati yāsyasi
iti uktvā te śara śataiḥ vajra vegaiḥ avākiran
bhīma cāpa cyutaiḥ bāṇaiḥ saḥ tha kṛtta ratha dhvajaḥ

original: hṛdi nirdārito bheje mūrchāṃ vyathitamānasaḥ // Bhmj_6.344 //
analyzed: hṛdi nirdāritaḥ bheje mūrchām vyathita mānasaḥ
atrā antare bhīṣma śaraiḥ hanyamāneṣu rājasu
ghoraḥ babhūva saṃmardaḥ kṛtānta samara utsavaḥ

atha avahāram sainyānām cakre śantanunandanaḥ
rāja sevā āvṛte sūrye yāte stam rudhira aruṇe
ṣaṣṭhaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
anyedyus maṇḍala vyūhe bhīṣmeṇa vihite svayam

original: unnanāda dhanadhvāno rathamasya jaghāna ca // Bhmj_6.350 //
analyzed: unnanāda dhana dhvānaḥ ratham asya jaghāna ca

original: sa hatāśvaṃ samutsṛjya rathaṃ putrasya saṃbhramāt /
analyzed: sa hata aśvam samutsṛjya ratham putrasya saṃbhramāt
āruroha hata anīkam śaṅkhasya ārūḍha dhanvinaḥ
droṇaḥ tha tau pitāputrau vilokya eka rathe sthitau
śaṅkhāya prāhiṇot horam mṛtyu daṇḍa upamam śaram
sa tena bhinna hṛdayaḥ papāta kṣataja ukṣitaḥ
vātena unmathitaḥ śailāt utphullaḥ iva kiśukaḥ
tatas śikhaṇḍinam droṇaḥ śaraiḥ viśikha varṣiṇam
hata aśve sātyaki ratham samārūḍhe śikhaṇḍini
alambusaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ krūra karmā tam ādravat
māyayā yudhyamānam tam garjantam rākṣaseśvaram
cakāra vimukham kopāt raurdreṇa astreṇa sātyakiḥ
śaineyena jite tasmin nirāvān arjuna ātmajaḥ

ghaṭotkacam atha āyāntam kṛtāntam iva bhairavam

vīram sa hatvā haiḍambam pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm

original: mādrīsutau tataḥ śalyaṃ vidhāya virathaṃ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: mādrī sutau tatas śalyam vidhāya viratham śaraiḥ

original: svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā nṛpaṃ jitvā śrutāyudham /
analyzed: svayam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā nṛpam jitvā śrutāyudham

original: vigāhya kauravānīkaṃ vidadhe vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_6.360 //
analyzed: vigāhya kaurava anīkam vidadhe vimukham śaraiḥ
cekitānena vijite gautame dhanvinām gurau

śikhaṇḍinam madra rājaḥ divyaiḥ astraiḥ avārayat

original: pārthena ca trigarteṣu jagāmāstaṃ divākaraḥ // Bhmj_6.363 //
analyzed: pārthena ca trigarteṣu jagāma astam divākaraḥ
tamobhiḥ āvṛte loke raṇe rakta āsava ākule
pramattaiḥ iva vetālaiḥ śibirāṇi yayuḥ nṛpāḥ
saptamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
bhīṣmeṇa sāgara vyūhe prātar viracite punar
śṛṅgāṭakam mahā vyūham cakre drupada nandanaḥ

original: droṇasya ca samudbhrāntapatākaṃ vidadhe ratham // Bhmj_6.367 //

original: tadvamanto viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhogānbhogabhṛtāṃ varāḥ // Bhmj_6.379 //
analyzed: tat vamantaḥ viṣam tīkṣṇam bhogān bhoga bhṛtām varāḥ

original: virāṭaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca subāhuṃ kanakadhvajam // Bhmj_6.390 //

original: utthāya bhīṣmaśibiraṃ pratasthe bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Bhmj_6.396 //

original: śayānaṃ ratnaparyaṅke praṇanāma vilokya tam // Bhmj_6.401 //

original: cakāra samare bhīṣmaḥ svayaśoviṣadā diśaḥ // Bhmj_6.422 //

rājñām śirobhiḥ pṛthivīm āstīrya pulaka ujjvalaḥ
raṇa lakṣmyāḥ sa vidadhe keli padma ākarān iva
śira stra śara nirgharṣa jātāḥ vahni kaṇāḥ babhuḥ

original: rājñāṃ hatānāṃ bhīṣmeṇa jīvā iva nabhaścarāḥ // Bhmj_6.424 //
analyzed: rājñām hatānām bhīṣmeṇa jīvāḥ iva nabhaścarāḥ
ghanena śara jālena grastāḥ lokena sarvatas
sa cakre sarva sainyānām akaṇḍa rajanī bhramam
vidīrṇe pāṇḍava bale chinna varma ratha dhvaje
gaja anīkeṣu bhagneṣu bhāgha śeṣeṣu rājasu
lajjām utsṛjya yāteṣu tyakta cāpeṣu keśavaḥ
satya saṃdham raṇe bhīṣmam jahi iti arjunam abravīt
dhanaṃjayaḥ tha niḥśvasya viṣaṇṇa vadana ambujaḥ
nindan muhur kṣattra dharmam pitāmaham upādravat
dṛṣaṭvā gāṇḍīvadhanvānam udyatam śara varṣiṇam
bale tūrṇam upāvṛtte punar yuyudhire bhaṭāḥ
bhīṣma cāpa cyutaiḥ bāṇaiḥ chāditam vīkṣya phalguṇam
ratham utsṛjya kaṃsāriḥ tam adhāvat bhuja āyudhaḥ
vilokya kupitam bhīṣmaḥ svayam kṛṣmam abhidrutam
uvāca dhanya tā mānī pulaka alaṃkṛta ākṛtiḥ
puṇya bhājām aham dhuryaḥ bhagavan kṛtinām varaḥ

original: yasya tvaṃ jagatāṃ nātho vadhāya svayamudyataḥ // Bhmj_6.432 //
analyzed: yasya tvam jagatām nāthaḥ vadhāya svayam udyataḥ
iti vādini gāṅgeye rathāt tūrṇam dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: avaruhya tataḥ kṛṣṇamānināya rathaṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_6.433 //
analyzed: avaruhya tatas kṛṣṇam ānināya ratham punar
atha arjuna śara āsāraiḥ ākīrṇe kuru kānane
punar śāntanavaḥ cakre saṃhāram pṛthivībhujām
ghore vyatikare tasmin bhagne su bhaṭa maṇḍale
avahāram akurvanta dina ante pāṇḍu nandanāḥ
navamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
tatas rājanyām vijane dharmarājaḥ janārdanam

original: jagāda rājakaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhinnaṃ bhīṣmeṇa duḥkhitaḥ // Bhmj_6.436 //
analyzed: jagāda rājakam dṛṣṭvā bhinnam bhīṣmeṇa duḥkhitaḥ
paśya kṛṣṇa prabuddhena gāṅgeya vaḍavāgninā
sainya ambudhiḥ aparyante mama nītaḥ lpa śeṣa tām
maṇḍalīkṛta cāpasya sahasrāṃśu śata tviṣaḥ
bhīṣmasya akhaṇḍalopi agre satyam paribhāva āspadam

original: alaṃ rājyena me tāvaditi vādini dharmaje /
analyzed: alam rājyena me tāvat iti vādini dharmaje
uvāca śauriḥ yotsye ham svayam śantanunandanam
na akārya me bhavat kāryam utsṛṣṭa samayaḥ dhunā

original: pālayāmi raṇe bhīṣmaṃ paśyatāṃ jagatībhujām // Bhmj_6.440 //
analyzed: pālayāmi raṇe bhīṣmam paśyatām jagatībhujām
etat ākarṇya kṛṣṇa uktam babhāṣe pāṇḍava agrajaḥ
na mithyā vādinam kāmāt tvām kuryām aham acyuta
jaya upāyam itas gatvā bhīṣmam pṛcchāmi bhū tale

original: sa hi māmāśiṣā pūrvaṃ vātsalyātsamayojayat // Bhmj_6.442 //
analyzed: sa hi mām āśiṣā pūrvam vātsalyāt samayojayat

original: iti niścitya kṛṣṇena bhrātṛbhiśca sahāśu kṛt /
analyzed: iti niścitya kṛṣṇena bhrātṛbhiḥ ca saha āśu kṛt
jagāma bhīṣma śibiram gūḍha cārī yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
sa pramamya anuja sakhaḥ śaurya rāśim pitāmaham

original: papraccha vijayopāyaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭastamabravīt // Bhmj_6.444 //
analyzed: papraccha vijaya upāyam sa ca pṛṣṭaḥ tam abravīt

original: na taṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu vīro māṃ vijayeta yaḥ /
analyzed: na tam paśyāmi lokeṣu vīraḥ mām vijayeta yaḥ

original: jayalābhe ca yuṣmākaṃ mayi jīvati kā kathā // Bhmj_6.445 //
analyzed: jaya lābhe ca yuṣmākam mayi jīvati kā kathā

original: na viśastrena saṃtraste na strīpūrve mameṣavaḥ /
analyzed: na viśastrena saṃtraste na strī pūrve mama iṣavaḥ

original: patanti tasmātklīvena māṃ ghātaya śikhaṇḍinā // Bhmj_6.446 //
analyzed: patanti tasmāt klīvena mām ghātaya śikhaṇḍinā
ukte devavratena iti lajjā vinamita ānanaḥ

original: akāma iva duḥkhena yayau svaśibiraṃ nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_6.447 //
analyzed: akāmaḥ iva duḥkhena yayau sva śibiram nṛpaḥ
tatas prabhāte vyūheṣu sainyeṣu su bhaṭaiḥ mithas
śikhaṇḍi pramukhāḥ para anīkam upādravan
tatas bhīṣma śara śreṇī lulite rāja maṇḍale
śikhaṇḍī dhuta kodaṇḍaḥ caṇḍa kopaḥ tam abhyadhāt
tam abravīt śāntanavaḥ kāmam prahara pārṣata
nanāma bhīṣma viśikhāḥ patanti anujane jane
iti vādinam abhyetya maṇḍalīkṛta kārmukaḥ
śikhaṇḍī niḥśvasan kopāt āpageyam abhāṣata
jetāram bhārgavasya api jānāmi tvām mahā ojasam

original: yudhi yudhyasva vā mā vā na me jīvangamiṣyasi // Bhmj_6.452 //
analyzed: yudhi yudhyasva vā mā vā na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
uktvā etat bāṇa jālena pārṣataḥ samapūrayat
rakṣyamāṇaḥ samabhyetya paścāt gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
bhīṣmaḥ pi tam an ādṛtya viddhvā kṛṣṇa arjunau śaraiḥ
viveśa pāṇḍava camūm rāja veṇu vana analaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumna mukhaiḥ vīraiḥ kauravāṇām tarasvinām
dāruṇaḥ prahāraḥ
tatas droṇi prabhṛtayaḥ vīrāḥ droṇasya śāsanāt
rakṣantaḥ samare bhīṣmam dhanaṃjayam ayodhayan
tatas śāntanavaḥ rājñām śaraiḥ aśani gauravaiḥ
mauli ratna aṃśu śabalam samunmathya virocanam
ākrīḍam iva kālasya vidhāya kadanam raṇe
abravīt kūṇita manāḥ dūrāt eva yudhiṣṭhiram

original: vadhāya kuru kaunteya yatnaṃ me nṛpatikṣayāt /
analyzed: vadhāya kuru kaunteya yatnam me nṛpati kṣayāt

original: viṣaṇṇo 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ putra raudreṇānena karmaṇā // Bhmj_6.459 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇaḥ ham bhṛśam putra raudreṇa anena karmaṇā
iti vādini gāṅgeye śithilīkṛta kārmuke

original: sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ somakaiśca sahādravan // Bhmj_6.460 //
analyzed: sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ somakaiḥ ca saha adravan

original: āvārya bhīṣmarakṣāyai dvandvaṃ yuddhāni cakrire // Bhmj_6.461 //
analyzed: āvārya bhīṣma rakṣāyai dvandvam yuddhāni cakrire
atha gāṅgeya viśikhaiḥ aprayatna ujjhitaiḥ api
avartata mahā raudraḥ rāja jīvita saṃkṣayaḥ
tam abhyadhāvat ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa kodaṇḍalaḥ
śikhaṇḍī khaṇḍaparaśu prabhāvam phalguṇa īritaḥ
svayam duryodhanena atha preritām vīkṣya vāhinīm
tasmin sva bhaṭa saṃhāre vartamāne pitāmahaḥ
udīrya ghoram divya astram abhyadhāvat dhanaṃjayam
atha arjunasya agram etya śikhaṇḍini puras sthite

original: vimānā iva gāṅgeyo mahāstraṃ saṃjahāra tat /
analyzed: vimānāḥ iva gāṅgeyaḥ mahā astram saṃjahāra tat
brahma loka abikāmeṣu yudhyamāneṣu rājasu
vīrāṇām bhīṣma viśikhaiḥ ayuteṣu patatsu ca
dārayantam para anīkam tam etya vasavaḥ bruvan
bhīṣma saṃnyāsa kālaḥ yam tava asmat abhikāṅkṣitaḥ
tatas ślatha udyame tasmin prasanne bhuvanatraye
arjuna pramukhāḥ sarve sāyakaiḥ tam apūrayan

original: chidyamāneṣu bāleṣu tasya tūrṇaṃ kirīṭinā // Bhmj_6.469 //
analyzed: chidyamāneṣu bāleṣu tasya tūrṇam kirīṭinā

na ete śikhaṇḍinaḥ bāṇāḥ śilā saṃghāta bhedinaḥ

original: viśanti mama marmāṇi bilaṃ viṣadharā iva /
analyzed: viśanti mama marmāṇi bilam viṣadharāḥ iva
ete te vajra saṃsparśāḥ nivāta kavaca chidaḥ
śarīra hāriṇaḥ ghorāḥ kirāta raṇa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: ityuktvā pāṇḍuputrāya śaktiṃ cikṣepa śaktimān // Bhmj_6.475 //
analyzed: iti uktvā pāṇḍu putrāya śaktim cikṣepa śaktimān

sarva āyudheṣu chinneṣu tatas gāṇḍīvadhanvanā

yudhyamāneṣu vīreṣu bhūta āviṣṭeṣu iva ākulam
dārume tumule tasmin nirvibhāge bala dvaye
aparāhṇe rathāt bhīṣmaḥ sahasrāṃśuḥ iva aparaḥ
a spṛṣṭa bhūmiḥ viśikhaiḥ papāta mahasām nidhiḥ
tasmin nipatite vīre ketau sarva dhanuṣmatām

original: tato nivṛtte saṃgrāme hāhākāre nabhaḥspṛśiḥ // Bhmj_6.480 //
analyzed: tatas nivṛtte saṃgrāme hāhākāre nabhaḥ spṛśiḥ

bhīṣma kālam pratīkṣasva yogavān uttarāyaṇam
sarvajña dhāraya prāṇān svacchanda nidhanaḥ hṛdi
śrutvā etat paramam yogam āsasāda suravrataḥ
tatas tridaśa vāhinyāḥ visṛṣṭa haṃsa rūpiṇaḥ
tam eva artham samabhyetya munayaḥ bhīṣmam abruvan

original: sthito 'smīti ca gāṅgeyo nigadya yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_6.484 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ smi iti ca gāṅgeyaḥ nigadya yaśasām nidhiḥ
ira talpe gataḥ sarvān kurūn bhītān asāntvayat
praṇatān atha saṃprāptān punar kaurava pāṇḍavān
aśru pūrṇa īkṣaṇān ūce saṃbhāvya kuru puṃgavaḥ

original: dhāraṇaṃ lambamānasya śiraso me vidhīyatām // Bhmj_6.486 //
analyzed: dhāraṇam lambamānasya śirasaḥ me vidhīyatām

original: jagrāha śāsanāttasya tribhiḥ pārthaḥ śaraiḥ śiraḥ // Bhmj_6.487 //
analyzed: jagrāha śāsanāt tasya tribhiḥ pārthaḥ śaraiḥ śiraḥ

original: pāṇḍavaiḥ kriyatāṃ saṃdhirityuvāca ca kauravam // Bhmj_6.488 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavaiḥ kriyatām saṃdhiḥ iti uvāca ca kauravam
daśamaḥ yuddha divasaḥ
tatas rajanyām yātāyām upāviṣṭeṣu rājasu
sevyamānaḥ muni janaiḥ bhīṣmaḥ jalam ayācata
maṇi kāñcana citreṣu kalaśeṣu amala ambhasaḥ

mahā ratheṣu yāteṣu samāmantrya āpagāsutam
karṇaḥ prasādayāmāsa tat abhyarcya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: bhajasva pārtheṣu śamaṃ vīrāste bhrātarastava // Bhmj_6.493 //
analyzed: bhajasva pārtheṣu śamam vīrāḥ te bhrātaraḥ tava

original: jāne sarvamavaśyaṃ tu bhavitavyamidaṃ prabho // Bhmj_6.494 //
analyzed: jāne sarvam avaśyam tu bhavitavyam idam prabho

original: anujānīhi māṃ tāta samarāya samudyatam // Bhmj_6.495 //
analyzed: anujānīhi mām tāta samarāya samudyatam
iti bruvāṇaḥ bhīṣmeṇa saḥ nujñātaḥ varūthinīm
prayayau kuru putrāṇām rathena ghana nādinā
atha kuru vṛṣabāṇām aṅga rāja utsukānām para paribhava dīkṣā bhagna māna ādarāṇām

original: patihitamanīkaṃ sāmyamāpa drutānāṃ sarayapavanapānīkampitānāṃ vanānām // Bhmj_6.497 //
analyzed: pati hitam anīkam sāmyam āpa drutānām saraya pavana pānī kampitānām vanānām
